description.value:
Source Adventurer's Armory 2 pg. 8, Pirates of the Inner Sea pg. 19, Skull and Shackles Player's Guide pg. 6, Villain Codex pg. 188

Statistics

Cost 15 gp Weight 4 lbs.

Damage 1d4 (small), 1d6 (medium); Critical 18-20/x2; Range -; Type S; Special -

Category One-Handed; Proficiency Martial

Weapon Groups Blades, Heavy

Description

This short, curved sword is favored by seafarers for closequarters combat. It is treated as a scimitar for any effects that apply to scimitars.
